name: Beat City (itch)
description:
Boost yourself into the skies and smash buildings to your heart's content with this action packed rhythm game!

Love music and love 3D-Platformers? This game is perfect for you! 

Use your own music to play this game, and try not to fall from the buildings (I bet you can't survive a whole song!)

I'm a 17 year old aspiring game developer, if you like my game, please consider following me on my Twitter or Instagram
